title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (06-05-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (06-05-20)
description:
Chris Mannix says he does not believe the Kevin Durant will come back to play this season in the NBA. Chris Says coming back too soon is exactly how Durant was hurt to begin with.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
